data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core REDMERE, Redmere, United Kingdom
Location: Northern edge of former mere. Core diameter: 10 cm. Site description: Holocene peats, clays and marls. Physiography: flat former coastal marshes. Surrounding vegetation: arable farmland.
The Fenland Project, number 9 Flandrian environmental change in Fenland
